text: Supplied video obtained Friday, October 18, 2019, of US President Donald Trump speaking to reporters at Naval Air Station Joint Reserve Base in Fort Worth, Texas, after Turkey and the United States agreed to a five-day ceasefire in Syria. "This is an amazing outcome," he says. "On behalf of the United States, I want to thank Turkey. I want to thank all of the people that have gotten together and made this happen." Trump also gives his thanks to the Kurds and says "they were incredibly happy with this solution". "It's a solution that saved their lives." (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/White House)
